revised_title: Horny Excrescencies or Extraordinary Large Nails on Fingers and Toes
tldr: A young man in Paris has developed large, horn-like nails on his fingers and toes. The nails are not sensitive, but the area where they connect to the skin is painful when bent. The condition began after he had smallpox and is likely a result of that illness. The author provides detailed descriptions and illustrations of the nails and discusses their growth and texture.
